features: 【Revolution of Underlining】 Be prepared for the experience of drawing lines like never before: Originally developed by Aechy, a set of dual tip colored curve pens equipped with special roller pen points, turn complicated mark lines into a single draw, none of the trouble, all of the fun.

【One Pen, Two Tips】 Dual tip highlighter design, roller end for drawing mark lines, and 0.4 mm fine tip for traditional writing and drawing. Combine them you’ll get an excellent tool for your bujo & planners.
【18 Colors & Line Types】 Includes 18 well-chosen vivid assorted colors and 18 delicated curve line types. Detailed mold and fine workmanship make Drawing a remarkable curve line never so easy.

【Safe & High Performance】 Aechy acid-free scrapbook pens using non-toxic ink don’t smear, fade, or skip. Safe to give this cool pen set to kids and girls as gifts. This fun pen set allows all family enjoys smooth application for card making, artwork, coloring books, school project, DIY letters, and more.

【Well Packaged and Perfect Service】: Our flair pens come in a steady storage case with a fold-over snap closure which can be easily placed anywhere, Could be a great gift for Christmas, New year's eve, Birthdays, Back to school, etc. We'll respond to questions or needs with perfect sales service within 12 hours.
body.description: Aechy Dual Tip Fine Tip Curve Pens Has there ever been a time when you find it hard to draw neat curved lines with normal pens? Try AECHY curve pen set with 12 colors and 10 different line types! Dual tip design, suitable for any needs, also a great gift to your kids in school!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About AECHY AECHY has been dedicated ourselves to creating unique and practical merchandise from the very beginning. We focus on digging into interesting ideas and turn them into real products. If there's any product that hasn't been invented yet, then it's our job to make it happen.

12 Colors Fine Tip Curve Pen Set by ​AECHY Lets you express yourself with exquisite mark lines and drawing. The Aechy felt tip curve pen set provides delicate and expressive lines and is great for drawing and witing.

Specifications Upgraded 12 colors & 10 line pattern types Water-based Ink, quick-dry and acid-free Marker Tip: 0.4 mm curve line, for marking and underlining Fine Tip: 0.5 mm, for detailed drawing and writing Aechy Dual Tip Fine Tip Curve Pens Has there ever been a time when you find it hard to draw neat curved lines with normal pens? Try AECHY curve pen set with 12 colors and 10 different line types! Dual tip design, suitable for any needs, also a great gift to your kids in school!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Caps are very difficult to remove on the marker side!
reviews.reviewText: All the markers work as shown, once the caps are off, with the exception of the Pink “Love Line and Line Double Headed Pen”. The roller must be off a bit, as the line is not straight, and a random heart center will glob up with ink. I tried using a toothpick to clear out what was in the center of one of the hearts, but it made no difference. Would prefer they all “glob”, or “do not glob”. It isn’t exactly as pictured, which sucks, because the heart one is the main reason I purchased these!**UPDATE to REVIEW** I contacted Aechy customer service, and they immediately sent me out a full replacement pack of pens… expedited delivery, with no hassle or fuss. The pens in the replacement pack all work perfectly! VERY impressed with their customer service…Harold was great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good product, bad outcome
reviews.reviewText: I bought these to send to a friend's daughter in Ukraine. I tested them first, and they are delightful. Just what a teenage girl would love. I packaged them up and mailed them, but they never arrived. Tracking shows they are sitting in Poland. (Not sent through Amazon.) I'm so sad about this. Say a little prayer for my friend and her family, will you? And put in a good word for having the package get to her, OK?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Roller is hard to keep straight
reviews.reviewText: Nice colors writes well. But rollers are almost impossible to make a straight line. At least and make sure it doesn’t skip any lines. Still fun to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great idea but application not great.
reviews.reviewText: This is a great idea as I always highlight and underline my notes and also in books, but the end that has the different underline designs doesn't work well. It seems the design doesn't permit for a straight line. You'll need to use a ruler and then the design of the pen tip with the actual liner doesn't always fit well against a ruler. It doesn't work well but would be great for children to color with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great gift for young child
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my daughter and they are fantastic. She loves to draw and write stories and these were a big hit. Very vivid colors and they write very well and the roller underline function is adorable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars fun roller pens
reviews.reviewText: Grandkids like these as well as my daughters. Very easy to decorate edges of paper, envelopes, etc. fun to watch it just roll on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You have to get the hang of it
reviews.reviewText: It is absolutely possible to draw a straight line. The little wheel needs to go straight as designed. So u have to make sure that the wheel itself is straight before drawing the line. Y’all are just pressing on it as u wish…the wheel doesn’t rotate…so when you try to drag it when the wheel is not straight it goes either up or down in the direction of the wheel . As you can see, the heart snd flower stamps are a bit patchy but not as bad as the others have shown…it’s because the Ink is not being distributed properly when u drag the wheel in the wrong direction. Also, press lightly vs pressing harder the designs come out crisper. Hope this helps someone!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful vivid colors in the perfect fine point end
reviews.reviewText: Not easy to use the fun ends of pens.
cute idea with the shapes rolling and printing on paper
I was a little disappointed that a few of them skip.
たまたま？なのかもしれませんが、緑のペンが〜線ではなくて、点線のタイプだった。とくにこだわりが無いから良かったが。。

J'ai payé 20.00 pour ces crayons et je ne les recommence pas. Malheureusement je n'ai plus la facture, si non je les retournerais immédiatement.😡😡 Ça fonctionne plus ou moins, il y a des bouts que l'encre du crayon ne fonctionne pas. Soit l'encre est plus foncée ou elle est trop pâle. Vraiment déçue.
